full_text:
Re: Epstein
From Ray Ormond
To Shirley V. Skipper-Scott
Date 2019/07/26 09:21
Subject: Re: Epstein
Attachments: TEXT.htm, Ray Ormond.vcf
Thanks Shirley.
J. Ray Ormond
Regional Director
Northeast Region
215-521-[redacted]
>>> Shirley V. Skipper-Scott 7/26/2019 9:09 AM >>>
Good Morning,
Inmate Epstein was assessed by Psychologist services and it has been determined he will remain on Psychological Observation over the weekend and he will be assessed on Monday.
*A Psychologist will assess him each day on the weekend*. Thanks.
Shirley Skipper-Scott
Associate Warden
MCC New York
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
Office: 646-836-[redacted]
Black Berry: 646-423-[redacted]
[redacted]@bop.gov
>>> Ray Ormond 7/24/2019 12:16 PM >>>
Thanks Shirley.
J. Ray Ormond
Regional Director
Northeast Region
215-521-[redacted]
>>> Shirley V. Skipper-Scott 7/24/2019 12:14 PM >>>
Hello,
Epstein is pending a Code 228, Tattooing or Self-Mutilation and I spoke with [redacted] who indicated that most likely he will be found competent because he is not mentally ill. [redacted]
Therefore, he will be pending a UDC hearing. Should he return to SHU, he will be housed with inmate [redacted]
Page 491
DOJ-OGR-00027251

text_blocks.content:
Re: Epstein
From Ray Ormond
To Shirley V. Skipper-Scott
Date 2019/07/26 09:21
Subject: Re: Epstein
Attachments: TEXT.htm, Ray Ormond.vcf

Thanks Shirley.
J. Ray Ormond
Regional Director
Northeast Region
215-521-[redacted]

>>> Shirley V. Skipper-Scott 7/26/2019 9:09 AM >>>
Good Morning,
Inmate Epstein was assessed by Psychologist services and it has been determined he will remain on Psychological Observation over the weekend and he will be assessed on Monday.
*A Psychologist will assess him each day on the weekend*. Thanks.

Shirley Skipper-Scott
Associate Warden
MCC New York
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
Office: 646-836-[redacted]
Black Berry: 646-423-[redacted]
[redacted]@bop.gov

>>> Ray Ormond 7/24/2019 12:16 PM >>>
Thanks Shirley.
J. Ray Ormond
Regional Director
Northeast Region
215-521-[redacted]

>>> Shirley V. Skipper-Scott 7/24/2019 12:14 PM >>>
Hello,
Epstein is pending a Code 228, Tattooing or Self-Mutilation and I spoke with [redacted] who indicated that most likely he will be found competent because he is not mentally ill. [redacted]
Therefore, he will be pending a UDC hearing. Should he return to SHU, he will be housed with inmate [redacted]

additional_notes: The document contains redactions, likely for privacy or security reasons.
